name: 陳文輝
objective: 1.物件導向程式設計特性介紹 2.視窗圖形界面設計 3. SQL語言的使用與資料庫連結 4.智慧型演算法 5.工程實例應用
schedule:
週次1: Introduction to Java
週次2: National Holiday (no class)
週次3: Primitive data type, Control Statement
週次4: Method, Array
週次5: Object, Class, String
週次6: Inheritance, Polymorphism
週次7: Abstract Class, Interface
週次8: GUI Programming
週次9: Midterm
週次10: Even-driven programming
週次11: Applet, Multimedia
週次12: Exception, Java I/O
週次13: Java Collection Framework
週次14: Multithreading
週次15: Java Database programming
週次16: Java Server Page
週次17: Networking
週次18: Final Report
materials: 本課程以自動化所學生優先，上課人數上限:15人。
